commits.author: Mark Robert Miller
commits.sourceNew:
/**
   * Releases the Directory so that it may be closed when it is no longer
   * referenced.
   * 
   * @param directory
   * @throws IOException
   */
  public abstract void release(Directory directory) throws IOException;

commits.author: Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew:
/**
